mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_DELIVERY (ID, PRODUCT_ID, DELIVERY_FEE, DELIVERY_FEE_KIND, DELIVERY_FEE_FREE, DELIVERY_HOW, DELIVERY_PAY_WHEN, DELIVERY_COMPANY) VALUES (SEQ_DELIVERY.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{deliveryFee}, #{deliveryFeeKind}, #{deliveryFeeFree}, #{deliveryHow}, #{deliveryPayWhen}, #{deliveryCompany})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_DELIVERY SET DELIVERY_FEE = #{deliveryFee}, DELIVERY_FEE_FREE = #{deliveryFeeFree}, DELIVERY_FEE_KIND = #{deliveryFeeKind}, DELIVERY_HOW = #{deliveryHow}, DELIVERY_PAY_WHEN = #{deliveryPayWhen}, DELIVERY_COMPANY = #{deliveryCompany}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PRODUCT_ID, MEMBER_ID, DELIVERY_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, ORDER_DATE, ORDER_ADDRESS, PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE, DELIVERY_STATUS FROM VIEW_DELIVERY;
